result.markdown:
---
title: "quarto tips"
subtitle: "with magick"

author: "Tony Duan"

execute:
  warning: false
  error: false

format:
  html:
    toc: true
    toc-location: right
    code-fold: show
    code-tools: true
    number-sections: true
    code-block-bg: true
    code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9"
    code-copy: true
---


# add a output folder bottom

1. add foldableCodeBlcok.lua into blog root folder

2. add in `_quarto.yml`

filters:
  - fold_results.lua

3. put following on code chunk

{r, attr.output='.details summary="sessionInfo()"'}
#| echo: false
sessionInfo()



# render all website


::: {.cell filename='Terminal'}

```{.r .cell-code}
quarto render "tidymodel in R"
```
:::






# referece:

https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/issues/341

https://gist.github.com/atusy/f2b5b992e45c68ab6823499f2339c6e6

```{.r .cell-code}
sessionInfo()
```
